snippet: A team of American adventurers crossed the Bering Strait on Sea-Doo watercraft, only to land in a restricted military zone where they were detained by border agents.
abstract: Team of American adventurers returns to Alaska after crossing the Bering Strait to Russia as part of a stunt for the reality show Dangerous Waters; the team had been detained by Russian border agents as much of the Russian coastal region is designated as a prohibited military zone.
lead_paragraph: A team of American adventurers crossed the Bering Strait on Sea-Doo watercraft, only to land in a restricted military zone where they were detained by border agents.

headline.seo: Team Returns to Alaska After 4-Day Detention in Russia
headline.main: Journey by Sea Takes Awkward Turn in Russia
headline.print_headline: Journey by Sea Takes Awkward Turn in Russia
